Info

Defines class Splash with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a splash screen info and adds hyperlinks.

class ats_utilities.splash.Splash(prop: Dict[Any, Any], verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: SplashProperty

Defines class Splash with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a splash screen info and adds hyperlinks. API splash component.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
methods:
__init__ - Initials Splash constructor.
center - Center console line.
center(columns: int, additional_shifter: int, text: str | None, verbose: bool = False) → None[source]¶

Center console line.

Parameters:

  • columns (<int>) – Colums for console session

  • additional_shifter (<int>) – Additional shifters

  • text (<Optional[str]>) – Text for console session | None

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError
